welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Babenhausen, a charming city known for its historical buildings and picturesque countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer and smaller terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
